reminder_list.timer_base_message: hey give your eyes a 20 second break looking at something 20 feet away. also maybe check in on how you're doing
it's been an hour, stahp. take long break... if not progressing need stop and move on for a bit... come back later

extra_messages: I apreciate you a lot honey ;---;
thank you for trying your best !!!
尽管你一再让我心碎，我想告诉你，如果有来生，我还是会选择和你一起，报税，开洗衣店
you make me want to be a better man ;-----;
thank you for being alive and waking up today.
